mapper.select: select article.id,article.title,article.description,article.content,user.username as author,user.avatar as author_avatar,article.update_time from article join user on article.user_id = user.id where article.deleted = 0 order by article.update_time desc

select article.id, article.title, article.content, article.update_time, user.id as user_id, user.username as author, user.avatar from article join user on article.user_id = user.id where article.id = #{id}
